Text:
After the recent incident at the Bushin Festival, the
Cult of Diablos has made no significant movements
in the Midgar Kingdom.

Not only the smaller factions, but even the Fenrir
sect is currently rebuilding and in a state of
disarray, making them unable to take action.
All according to your plan, my lord.

We can now concentrate our forces on the affairs in
the Oriana Kingdom without having to constantly
watch our backs.
However, I must also report some concerning intel.

There has lately been an influx of money in the
Lawless City.
Money...

That area doesn't belong to any nation. It's a vast
slum where the world's evils, wealth, and power
converge. If tensions escalate there, the impact on
the outside world would be immeasurable.

While we're committed to executing our plan, we'll
regretfully have to dispatch reinforcements at once
andâ€”
It reeks.
*gasp*
*gasp*
*gasp*
The Lawless City...
It reeks of blood...
A storm is coming...
A storm of blood.
The moon...
It's...
...red.
Like the legendary...
...Red Moon.
The tragedy from a thousand years ago...

But then the Lawless Cityâ€”no, all the surrounding
nations will be wiped out...
Calm yourself.

If this is a precursor to the Red Moon, then we can't
afford to observe from the sidelines. We, the Seven
Shadows, must actâ€”
No.
...Ngh!
Leave the monâ€”the matter to me.
You mean to handle this on your own?
You disapprove?

I understand that's the most efficient way to handle
the situation, but...
If something were to happen to you, weâ€”
Don't worry.
After all, it's just a red moon. Right?
Heh...

Indeed, just a red moon... Even the legendary Red
Moon pales next to you.
Heh...
Don't you think the moon looks beautiful like this?

We can appreciate its beauty because of your
presence, my lord.
We'll be praying for your success.
May all be according to your will.

I'll investigate the dragon tears while waiting for
you to get back.

It was just an ordinary moon at the start,
barely tinted red.

No one noticed it was a prelude to the Blood Queen's
resurrectionâ€”except for Master Shadow!

(Leave it to these girls, and suddenly you have the
birth of the "legendary Red Moon.")
(Talk about Oscar-winning improv skills.)
Awooooooo!
(I mean, it's just a slightly reddish moon...)
